description: Takato Yayoi is Himeno`s friend from middle school and her schoolmate, having transferred to Himeno`s school with her. In the anime adaptation, their earlier friendship is never mentioned, and its implied they became friends at school after Yayoi ignores bullies telling her to stay away from Himeno. Her personality is also changed into that of a hopeless romantic who spins outrageous scenarios about the pursuit of love.
name: Takato Yayoi
